title: I never got my Rakan and Xayah icon.
body: I gifted one of my friends the champion Xayah on release but I never got the icon you are supposed to get.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you sent a gift!  There are a few eligible players, so we're asking players to wait about 2 weeks after the event to roll them out to everyone.  You might see a few get it before others, but hang tight.  The goodies will come!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EAltaIr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-02T22:06:18.805+0000)
>
> I looked into this for you and see that you sent a gift!  There are a few eligible players, so we're asking players to wait about 2 weeks after the event to roll them out to everyone.  You might see a few get it before others, but hang tight.  The goodies will come!

Awesome thanks!
